org.deeplearning4j.word2vec.tokenizer

Interface Tokenizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTokenizer, PosUimaTokenizer, UimaTokenizer

    public interface Tokenizer
    A representation of a tokenizer. Different applications may require different kind of tokenization (say rules based vs more formal NLP approaches)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int countTokens()
      The number of tokens in the tokenizer
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTokens()
      Returns a list of all the tokens
      boolean hasMoreTokens()
      An iterator for tracking whether more tokens are left in the iterator not
      java.lang.String nextToken()
      The next token (word usually) in the string
